mapper.select: SELECT s.`stuNumber`,s.`stuName`,s.`stuDept`,s.`stuType`,COUNT(*) AS all_books,l.`libStatus` FROM student s,book b ,lib l WHERE s.`stuID`=b.`stuID` AND l.`stuID`=b.`stuID` GROUP BY l.`stuID`,l.libStatus;
select s.stuNumber,s.stuName,s.stuDept,s.stuType,b.bookNum,b.bookName,b. from book b,student s where b.stuID = s.stuID and stuNumber=#{stuNumber}
